mapper.sql: id, customer_no, score, gold, load_factor, uuid_id, uuid_type, nick_name, head_url, customer_status, customer_type, created_date, modified_date
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from customer
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into customer (customer_no, score, gold, load_factor, uuid_id, uuid_type, nick_name, head_url, customer_status, customer_type, created_date, modified_date ) values (#{customerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gold,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{loadFactor,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{uuidId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uuidType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
